name: Patient Satisfaction Survey
description: Automatically send satisfaction surveys after patient visits. Collect NPS scores, identify unhappy patients for immediate follow-up, and track satisfaction trends to improve care quality.

ðŸ™ *Thank You for Your Feedback!*

We're always looking to improve. Is there anything specific we could have done better?

Reply with your suggestions - we read every response.

Thank you for choosing {{clinic_name}}!
